meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the geographical distribution of animals.
meanings.sent1: Zoogeographies help scientists understand where different animals live.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use zoogeographies to map out where specific animal species are found.
meanings.sent3: The zoogeographies class was full of students excited to learn about animal habitats.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the zoogeographies of the forest revealed a diverse range of wildlife.
meanings.sent5: Learning about zoogeographies made the concept of animal territories clearer.

meanings.definition: The study of the geographical distribution of animal species.
meanings.sent1: Understanding zoogeographies involves studying how animals are spread across different regions.
meanings.sent2: Zoogeographies play a crucial role in conservation efforts to protect endangered species.
meanings.sent3: The zoogeographies research team went on a field trip to observe animal migration patterns.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for zoogeographies led her to explore remote areas to document new animal sightings.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on zoogeographies provided detailed maps showing animal distribution worldwide.
